Gets transform, name, and id information about the given target entity or entities.

==Syntax==

: <code>querytarget <victim: target></code>

==Arguments==

<code>victim: target</code>
: Specifies the targets. Must be one or more player names and/or [[target selectors]] separated by spaces (<code>@e</code> is permitted to target entities other than players).

==Result==

Fails if ...

On success,command block: comparator output
